013package org.apache.juneau.urlencoding;
014
015import java.io.*;
016import java.lang.reflect.*;
017import java.nio.charset.*;
018import java.util.*;
019import java.util.function.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.parser.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.uon.*;
029
030/**
031 * Session object that lives for the duration of a single use of {@link UrlEncodingParser}.
032 *
033 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
034 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe and is typically discarded after one use.
035 * </ul>
036 *
037 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
038 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/UrlEncodingBasics">URL-Encoding Basics</a>
039 * </ul>
040 */
041@SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "rawtypes" })
042public class UrlEncodingParserSession extends UonParserSession {
043
044   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
045   // Static
046   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
047
048   /**
049    * Creates a new builder for this object.
050    *
051    * @param ctx The context creating this session.
052    * @return A new builder.
053    */
054   public static Builder create(UrlEncodingParser ctx) {
055      return new Builder(ctx);
056   }
057
058   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
059   // Builder
060   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
061
062   /**
063    * Builder class.
064    */
065   @FluentSetters
066   public static class Builder extends UonParserSession.Builder {
067
068      UrlEncodingParser ctx;
069
070      /**
071       * Constructor
072       *
073       * @param ctx The context creating this session.
074       */
075      protected Builder(UrlEncodingParser ctx) {
076         super(ctx);
077         this.ctx = ctx;
078      }
079
080      @Override
081      public UrlEncodingParserSession build() {
082         return new UrlEncodingParserSession(this);
083      }
084
085      // <FluentSetters>
086
087      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
088      public <T> Builder apply(Class<T> type, Consumer<T> apply) {
089         super.apply(type, apply);
090         return this;
091      }
092

095         super.debug(value);
096         return this;
097      }

103      }

115      }

126         return this;
127      }

131         super.mediaType(value);
132         return this;
133      }

137         super.mediaTypeDefault(value);
138         return this;

151      }

154      public Builder javaMethod(Method value) {
155         super.javaMethod(value);
156         return this;
157      }
158

160      public Builder outer(Object value) {
161         super.outer(value);
162         return this;
163      }

166      public Builder schema(HttpPartSchema value) {
167         super.schema(value);
168         return this;
169      }

172      public Builder schemaDefault(HttpPartSchema value) {
173         super.schemaDefault(value);
174         return this;
175      }

178      public Builder fileCharset(Charset value) {
179         super.fileCharset(value);

185         super.streamCharset(value);

193      }

198   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
199   // Instance
200   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
201
202   private final UrlEncodingParser ctx;
203
204   /**
205    * Constructor.
206    *
207    * @param builder The builder for this object.
208    */
209   public UrlEncodingParserSession(Builder builder) {
210      super(builder);
211      ctx = builder.ctx;
212   }
213
214   /**
215    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the specified bean property should be expanded as multiple key-value pairs.
216    *
217    * @param pMeta The metadata on the bean property.
218    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the specified bean property should be expanded as multiple key-value pairs.
219    */
220   public final boolean shouldUseExpandedParams(BeanPropertyMeta pMeta) {
221      ClassMeta<?> cm = pMeta.getClassMeta().getSerializedClassMeta(this);
222      if (cm.isCollectionOrArray()) {
223         if (isExpandedParams() || getUrlEncodingClassMeta(pMeta.getBeanMeta().getClassMeta()).isExpandedParams())
224            return true;
225      }
226      return false;
227   }
228
229   @Override /* ParserSession */
230   protected <T> T doParse(ParserPipe pipe, ClassMeta<T> type) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException {
231      try (UonReader r = getUonReader(pipe, true)) {
232         return parseAnything(type, r, getOuter());
233      }
234   }
235
236   @Override /* ReaderParserSession */
237   protected <K,V> Map<K,V> doParseIntoMap(ParserPipe pipe, Map<K,V> m, Type keyType, Type valueType) throws Exception {
238      try (UonReader r = getUonReader(pipe, true)) {
239         if (r.peekSkipWs() == '?')
240            r.read();  // NOSONAR - skip leading '?'.
241         m = parseIntoMap2(r, m, getClassMeta(Map.class, keyType, valueType), null);
242         return m;
243      }
244   }
245
246   private <T> T parseAnything(ClassMeta<T> eType, UonReader r, Object outer) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException {
247
248      if (eType == null)
249         eType = (ClassMeta<T>)object();
250      ObjectSwap<T,Object> swap = (ObjectSwap<T,Object>)eType.getSwap(this);
251      BuilderSwap<T,Object> builder = (BuilderSwap<T,Object>)eType.getBuilderSwap(this);
252      ClassMeta<?> sType = null;
253      if (builder != null)
254         sType = builder.getBuilderClassMeta(this);
255      else if (swap != null)
256         sType = swap.getSwapClassMeta(this);
257      else
258         sType = eType;
259
260      if (sType.isOptional())
261         return (T)Utils.opt(parseAnything(eType.getElementType(), r, outer));
262
263      int c = r.peekSkipWs();
264      if (c == '?')
265         r.read();  // NOSONAR - skip leading '?'.
266
267      Object o;
268
269      if (sType.isObject()) {
270         JsonMap m = new JsonMap(this);
271         parseIntoMap2(r, m, getClassMeta(Map.class, String.class, Object.class), outer);
272         if (m.containsKey("_value"))
273            o = m.get("_value");
274         else
275            o = cast(m, null, eType);
276      } else if (sType.isMap()) {
277         Map m = (sType.canCreateNewInstance() ? (Map)sType.newInstance() : newGenericMap(sType));
278         o = parseIntoMap2(r, m, sType, m);
279      } else if (builder != null) {
280         BeanMap m = toBeanMap(builder.create(this, eType));
281         m = parseIntoBeanMap(r, m);
282         o = m == null ? null : builder.build(this, m.getBean(), eType);
283      } else if (sType.canCreateNewBean(outer)) {
284         BeanMap m = newBeanMap(outer, sType.getInnerClass());
285         m = parseIntoBeanMap(r, m);
286         o = m == null ? null : m.getBean();
287      } else if (sType.isCollection() || sType.isArray() || sType.isArgs()) {
288         // ?1=foo&2=bar...
289         Collection c2 = ((sType.isArray() || sType.isArgs()) || ! sType.canCreateNewInstance(outer)) ? new JsonList(this) : (Collection)sType.newInstance();
290         Map<Integer,Object> m = new TreeMap<>();
291         parseIntoMap2(r, m, sType, c2);
292         c2.addAll(m.values());
293         if (sType.isArray())
294            o = ArrayUtils.toArray(c2, sType.getElementType().getInnerClass());
295         else if (sType.isArgs())
296            o = c2.toArray(new Object[c2.size()]);
297         else
298            o = c2;
299      } else {
300         // It could be a non-bean with _type attribute.
301         JsonMap m = new JsonMap(this);
302         parseIntoMap2(r, m, getClassMeta(Map.class, String.class, Object.class), outer);
303         if (m.containsKey(getBeanTypePropertyName(eType)))
304            o = cast(m, null, eType);
305         else if (m.containsKey("_value"))
306            o = convertToType(m.get("_value"), sType);
307         else if (sType.getProxyInvocationHandler() != null) {
308            o = newBeanMap(outer, sType.getInnerClass()).load(m).getBean();
309         } else {
310            if (sType.getNotABeanReason() != null)
311               throw new ParseException(this, "Class ''{0}'' could not be instantiated as application/x-www-form-urlencoded.  Reason: ''{1}''", sType, sType.getNotABeanReason());
312            throw new ParseException(this, "Malformed application/x-www-form-urlencoded input for class ''{0}''.", sType);
313         }
314      }
315
316      if (swap != null && o != null)
317         o = unswap(swap, o, eType);
318
319      if (outer != null)
320         setParent(eType, o, outer);
321
322      return (T)o;
323   }
324
325   private <K,V> Map<K,V> parseIntoMap2(UonReader r, Map<K,V> m, ClassMeta<?> type, Object outer) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException {
326
327      ClassMeta<K> keyType = (ClassMeta<K>)(type.isArgs() || type.isCollectionOrArray() ? getClassMeta(Integer.class) : type.getKeyType());
328
329      int c = r.peekSkipWs();
330      if (c == -1)
331         return m;
332
333      final int S1=1; // Looking for attrName start.
334      final int S2=2; // Found attrName end, looking for =.
335      final int S3=3; // Found =, looking for valStart.
336      final int S4=4; // Looking for & or end.
337      boolean isInEscape = false;
338
339      int state = S1;
340      int argIndex = 0;
341      K currAttr = null;
342      while (c != -1) {
343         c = r.read();
344         if (! isInEscape) {
345            if (state == S1) {
346               if (c == -1)
347                  return m;
348               r.unread();
349               Object attr = parseAttr(r, true);
350               currAttr = attr == null ? null : convertAttrToType(m, trim(attr.toString()), keyType);
351               state = S2;
352               c = 0; // Avoid isInEscape if c was '\'
353            } else if (state == S2) {
354               if (c == '\u0002')
355                  state = S3;
356               else if (c == -1 || c == '\u0001') {
357                  m.put(currAttr, null);
358                  if (c == -1)
359                     return m;
360                  state = S1;
361               }
362            } else if (state == S3) {
363               if (c == -1 || c == '\u0001') {
364                  ClassMeta<V> valueType = (ClassMeta<V>)(type.isArgs() ? type.getArg(argIndex++) : type.isCollectionOrArray() ? type.getElementType() : type.getValueType());
365                  V value = convertAttrToType(m, "", valueType);
366                  m.put(currAttr, value);
367                  if (c == -1)
368                     return m;
369                  state = S1;
370               } else  {
371                  // For performance, we bypass parseAnything for string values.
372                  ClassMeta<V> valueType = (ClassMeta<V>)(type.isArgs() ? type.getArg(argIndex++) : type.isCollectionOrArray() ? type.getElementType() : type.getValueType());
373                  V value = (V)(valueType.isString() ? super.parseString(r.unread(), true) : super.parseAnything(valueType, r.unread(), outer, true, null));
374
375                  // If we already encountered this parameter, turn it into a list.
376                  if (m.containsKey(currAttr) && valueType.isObject()) {
377                     Object v2 = m.get(currAttr);
378                     if (! (v2 instanceof JsonList)) {
379                        v2 = new JsonList(v2).setBeanSession(this);
380                        m.put(currAttr, (V)v2);
381                     }
382                     ((JsonList)v2).add(value);
383                  } else {
384                     m.put(currAttr, value);
385                  }
386                  state = S4;
387                  c = 0; // Avoid isInEscape if c was '\'
388               }
389            } else if (state == S4) {
390               if (c == '\u0001')
391                  state = S1;
392               else if (c == -1) {
393                  return m;
394               }
395            }
396         }
397         isInEscape = (c == '\\' && ! isInEscape);
398      }
399      if (state == S1)
400         throw new ParseException(this, "Could not find attribute name on object.");
401      if (state == S2)
402         throw new ParseException(this, "Could not find '=' following attribute name on object.");
403      if (state == S3)
404         throw new ParseException(this, "Dangling '=' found in object entry");
405      if (state == S4)
406         throw new ParseException(this, "Could not find end of object.");
407
408      return null; // Unreachable.
409   }
410
411   private <T> BeanMap<T> parseIntoBeanMap(UonReader r, BeanMap<T> m) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException {
412
413      int c = r.peekSkipWs();
414      if (c == -1)
415         return m;
416
417      final int S1=1; // Looking for attrName start.
418      final int S2=2; // Found attrName end, looking for =.
419      final int S3=3; // Found =, looking for valStart.
420      final int S4=4; // Looking for , or }
421      boolean isInEscape = false;
422
423      int state = S1;
424      String currAttr = "";
425      mark();
426      try {
427         while (c != -1) {
428            c = r.read();
429            if (! isInEscape) {
430               if (state == S1) {
431                  if (c == -1) {
432                     return m;
433                  }
434                  r.unread();
435                  mark();
436                  currAttr = parseAttrName(r, true);
437                  if (currAttr == null)  // Value was '%00'
438                     return null;
439                  state = S2;
440               } else if (state == S2) {
441                  if (c == '\u0002')
442                     state = S3;
443                  else if (c == -1 || c == '\u0001') {
444                     m.put(currAttr, null);
445                     if (c == -1)
446                        return m;
447                     state = S1;
448                  }
449               } else if (state == S3) {
450                  if (c == -1 || c == '\u0001') {
451                     if (! currAttr.equals(getBeanTypePropertyName(m.getClassMeta()))) {
452                        BeanPropertyMeta pMeta = m.getPropertyMeta(currAttr);
453                        if (pMeta == null) {
454                           onUnknownProperty(currAttr, m, null);
455                           unmark();
456                        } else {
457                           unmark();
458                           setCurrentProperty(pMeta);
459                           // In cases of "&foo=", create an empty instance of the value if createable.
460                           // Otherwise, leave it null.
461                           ClassMeta<?> cm = pMeta.getClassMeta();
462                           if (cm.canCreateNewInstance()) {
463                              try {
464                                 pMeta.set(m, currAttr, cm.newInstance());
465                              } catch (BeanRuntimeException e) {
466                                 onBeanSetterException(pMeta, e);
467                                 throw e;
468                              }
469                           }
470                           setCurrentProperty(null);
471                        }
472                     }
473                     if (c == -1)
474                        return m;
475                     state = S1;
476                  } else {
477                     if (! currAttr.equals(getBeanTypePropertyName(m.getClassMeta()))) {
478                        BeanPropertyMeta pMeta = m.getPropertyMeta(currAttr);
479                        if (pMeta == null) {
480                           onUnknownProperty(currAttr, m, parseAnything(object(), r.unread(), m.getBean(false), true, null));
481                           unmark();
482                        } else {
483                           unmark();
484                           setCurrentProperty(pMeta);
485                           if (shouldUseExpandedParams(pMeta)) {
486                              ClassMeta et = pMeta.getClassMeta().getElementType();
487                              Object value = parseAnything(et, r.unread(), m.getBean(false), true, pMeta);
488                              setName(et, value, currAttr);
489                              try {
490                                 pMeta.add(m, currAttr, value);
491                              } catch (BeanRuntimeException e) {
492                                 onBeanSetterException(pMeta, e);
493                                 throw e;
494                              }
495                           } else {
496                              ClassMeta<?> cm = pMeta.getClassMeta();
497                              Object value = parseAnything(cm, r.unread(), m.getBean(false), true, pMeta);
498                              setName(cm, value, currAttr);
499                              try {
500                                 pMeta.set(m, currAttr, value);
501                              } catch (BeanRuntimeException e) {
502                                 onBeanSetterException(pMeta, e);
503                                 throw e;
504                              }
505                           }
506                           setCurrentProperty(null);
507                        }
508                     }
509                     state = S4;
510                  }
511               } else if (state == S4) {
512                  if (c == '\u0001')
513                     state = S1;
514                  else if (c == -1) {
515                     return m;
516                  }
517               }
518            }
519            isInEscape = (c == '\\' && ! isInEscape);
520         }
521         if (state == S1)
522            throw new ParseException(this, "Could not find attribute name on object.");
523         if (state == S2)
524            throw new ParseException(this, "Could not find '=' following attribute name on object.");
525         if (state == S3)
526            throw new ParseException(this, "Could not find value following '=' on object.");
527         if (state == S4)
528            throw new ParseException(this, "Could not find end of object.");
529      } finally {
530         unmark();
531      }
532
533      return null; // Unreachable.
534   }
535
536   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
537   // Properties
538   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
539
540   /**
541    * Parser bean property collections/arrays as separate key/value pairs.
542    *
543    * @see UrlEncodingParser.Builder#expandedParams()
544    * @return
545    * <jk>false</jk> if serializing the array <c>[1,2,3]</c> results in <c>?key=$a(1,2,3)</c>.
546    * <br><jk>true</jk> if serializing the same array results in <c>?key=1&amp;key=2&amp;key=3</c>.
547    */
548   protected final boolean isExpandedParams() {
549      return ctx.isExpandedParams();
550   }
551
552   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
553   // Extended metadata
554   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
555
556   /**
557    * Returns the language-specific metadata on the specified class.
558    *
559    * @param cm The class to return the metadata on.
560    * @return The metadata.
561    */
562   protected UrlEncodingClassMeta getUrlEncodingClassMeta(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
563      return ctx.getUrlEncodingClassMeta(cm);
564   }
565}
